title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 ยง 86.5 - General provisions
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 ยง 86.5 - General provisions

State Regulations
(a) Fires
are prohibited. (b) No person shall
remove, cut or willfully damage or destroy living vegetation of any kind, except pursuant to written permission of the regional supervisor or his
agent. (c) Other than moored
vessels, all personal property shall be removed from the area at the time of
leaving the area. (d) Trespassing
for any purpose whatsoever is prohibited within any area posted with
"restricted area" signs, except pursuant to written permission of the regional
supervisor or his agent. (e) No
person shall discard or deposit any trash, waste or litter on lands or waters
except in waste receptacles when provided for such purpose. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6
ยง
86.5

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
